channel.title: Machine Learning on Flavio Hafner
channel.description: Recent content in Machine Learning on Flavio Hafner

item.title: Empirically testing privacy in machine learning
item.description: We review the empirical testing of privacy in machine learning, focusing on the intuitions for and assumptions behind such tests. We then discuss whether and how these tests could be used when evaluating generative algorithms for deployment at statistical agencies and in the health care system.
